about_the_game:
Hi guys,
we added this just as an incentive for developers! The Machine Gun is free, but we spend many hours creating missions and improving performance and the fun factor of this!
So, you DO NOT NEED to buy it if you don't want to! Everything is already included in the game.

Want to make Helicopter Simulator VR 2021 - Rescue Missions even better?

XM137 Machine Gun - 7.62 mm is a powerful weapon that is attached to the front of the TG-66.
Use it for military missions or If you just want to practice your shooting skills.

Complete all tasks or have fun destroying random items in the scene! It is your call!

2 liveries included:
- Desert camouflage
- Metal Black

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
